description.v: This women's tank top is a go-to shirt for summer. The soft, lightweight fabric helps with moisture management to keep you dry in the heat. Sleeveless construction and a loose fit give you plenty of ventilation. Large adidas brandmark across the chest.

description_list.v:
• climalite® fabric sweeps sweat away from your skin
  • Rounded neck
  • adidas brandmark on chest
  • This product is part of the adidas sustainable product program: Products are made in more sustainable ways to make the world a better place; Every fiber counts: Recycled polyester saves resources and decreases emissions
  • Imported
